title: The Cosmological Symbolism of Gremlins
description:
Gremlins is a surprising Christmas monster movie, but in the humor and mayhem, one can discover the true meaning of Christmas. 

This video was edited by Thomas Wijnaendts van Resandt of the Storytellers channel:  https://bit.ly/2ofbLoG

My original interpretation of Gremlins was done on the Wewyard podcast last year.  https://soundcloud.com/weyward/episode-29-gizmotheque-feat-jonathan-pageau

Song in the Outro is from Akira the Don's Meaning Wave Christmas album.  https://youtu.be/c5K0znZXIo4

My links:  

patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

The podcast: https://soundcloud.com/jonathan-pagea...
website: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicW...
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan
